field.name: RenewalEmail
field.string:
Dear [FirstName]~

It's time to renew your Wellcoaches membership~ which expires on [EndDate].

We will automatically renew your membership and billed to your credit card.

If you do not wish to renew your membership~ please go to http://www.wellcoach.com/index.cfm?PageID=unsubscribe&mid=[memberid] or email us at unsubscribe@wellcoach.com with your full name and your username. Please email us at members@wellcoach.com if you have any suggestions~ comments~ questions~ or concerns.

Thank you again.

Yours sincerely~

The Wellcoaches Team

field.name: thankyoutext
field.string:
Dear [FirstName]~

Thank you for joining Wellcoaches!

Welcome to our growing community of health and fitness professionals who are dedicated to becoming great coaches!

As a reminder~ this is monthly~ automatically recurring payment which you may cancel at anytime by contacting your Coach Concierge. If you have elected the Coach-in-Practice Membership~ please allow up to 2 business days to for access to the web coaching platform and marketing page. You may access your Member Home Page immediately.

Your username and password are:

Username: [username]

Password: [password]

We will also send you this confirmation by email. Please keep an easy-to-find record of your Wellcoaches Username and Password.

To enter the Members Only area~ click on Login above. This will take you directly to your Members Only page~ where we'll ask you to provide more information to help us match our classes to your interests.

When you return to www.wellcoach.com~ please click on Login and type in your username and password.

Please email us at members@wellcoach.com if you have any suggestions~ comments~ questions~ or concerns.

Yours sincerely~

The Wellcoaches Team

field.name: EmailText
field.string:
Dear [FirstName]~

Thank you for joining Wellcoaches!

Welcome to our growing community of health and fitness professionals who are dedicated to becoming great coaches!

As a reminder~ this is monthly~ automatically recurring payment which you may cancel at anytime by contacting your Coach Concierge. If you have elected the Coach-in-Practice Membership~ please allow up to 2 business days to for access to the web coaching platform and marketing page. You may access your Member Home Page immediately.

Your username and password are:

Username: [username]

Password: [password]

Please keep an easy-to-find record of your Wellcoaches Username and Password.

To enter the Members Only area~ please go to www.wellcoach.com~ click on LOGIN~ and type in your username and password in the login boxes.

Please take advantage of all of our member services:

  • Monthly newsletter (with frequent extra editions). You can view all past newsletter issues on the Newsletters page
  • Free member classes at the My Member Class page (monthly web audio class)
  • Member Library with articles you can pass on to associates/friends/clients on various wellness topics

Please email us at members@wellcoach.com if you have any questions.

Yours sincerely~

The Wellcoaches Team
